name: Clash of Magic: Spectator Only
description:
THIS IS A FREE-TO-PLAY SPECTATOR VERSION OF CLASH OF MAGIC VR

Clash of Magic is a VR tower rush game for true RTS fans from the eSports community because it offers a deep and complex strategic experience. The game requires planning and skill to excel in its fierce magical duels. You will immerse yourself into the role of a student at the Academy of Witchcraft and Wizardry. There, you will face a series of campaigns to learn spells and summons, then challenge each other in the Arena for the title of the Grandmaster Witch or Wizard.

This is not just a VR experience. It is a seriously fun, interactive, and competitive game where you will be playing as a mighty summoner. Your goal is to battle other summoners with your mighty army in realtime. The game features:

PVP Arena
PVE Campaign
Leaderboard: PVP

Practice daily. Test your skills in PVP. Get on the leaderboards! Become a legendary wizard!
